name: Hole (SecretBasment)
description:
Fast paced top-down shooter, using only 2 keys!

Controlls are so simple, mostly becose i tried to chalange myself, to make game with so simple controlls, but also becose i wnat to publish it on google play later!

Current version has:

-3 types of enemies: Zombie, tank and fast boi.

-One boss: Big boi

-6 Weapons: Handgun, uzi, shootgun and akimbo version of these.

-4 Levels plus 3 upgrade screens.

-Randomly generated levels, to add more replayability!
